item.title: Isnt this suppose to work?
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

case 4092:
if (playerIsSaradomin == true && playerHasItem(4039) || playerEquipment[3] == (4039)) //saradomin Banner
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" scored a point for Zamorak and got 20k cash for scoring!";
addItem(995, 20000); //Add a ticket
sendMessage(“You win 20k cash for scoring!”);
zammyScore += 1; //Increase Zamorak score with one
remove(4039, 3); //Unequip the Banner
deleteItem(4039, getItemSlot(4039), 1); //Delete the Banner
}
else if (playerIsZamorak == true && playerHasItem(4903) || playerEquipment[3] == (4903))
{
sendMessage(“you allready stole the flag!!”);
}
else if (playerIsZamorak == true)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" stole the Zamorak Banner!";
addItem(4037, 1); //Add Banner
wear(4037, getItemSlot(4037)); //Equip Banner
}
else if (playerIsSaradomin == false && playerIsZamorak == false)
{
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3089;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

I have been starring at this for the last 30min trying to chang it around but can get it to work, so any help on this…

Read full topic
